Faculty of Technology

Submission of Medicals for Attendance of Classes

Instructions for submitting medicals
  1. You can upload a medical certificate and the dates covered by the medical certificate.
  2. TECMIS will give you a reference number (REF No) for each medical.
  3. The original medical certificate should be submitted to the Deans Office with the Reference number and Student ID number.
  4. If you make any mistake you may edit during the "Pending Approval" period.
  5. Conditions stated 3. above are not fulfilled, the medical certificate will not be considered.
